ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1584
ygData.msgSnippet: You paid 5 pp for scream of pain?  The guy robbed me then, 154 plat! Elanna 61 Virtuoso of Innorruk. *********** REPLY SEPARATOR  ***********
ygData.messageBody:
You paid 5 pp for scream of pain? The guy robbed me then, 154 plat!

Elanna 61 Virtuoso of Innorruk.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 10/23/2002 at 11:39 AM eqbards@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
>There is 1 message in this issue.
>
>Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. PoP Songs
> From: Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...>
>
>
>________________________________________________________________________
>________________________________________________________________________
>
>Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 22 Oct 2002 10:45:39 -0700 (PDT)
> From: Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...>
>Subject: PoP Songs
>
>
>After hitting 5 different stores this morning I finally got the PoP
>expansion ... was late coming bak to work from lunch but well worth the
>time it took:
>Plane of Knowledge: Bard Trainer is a Virtuoso, merchants are Minstrels.
>Bard Vendors are in the basement of the library and Minstrel Cirsaelle
>sells the new songs:
>Chant of Disease is lvl 42 and costs 20pp
>Chant of Poison is lvl 50 and costs 23pp
>Scream of Pain is 61 and costs 5pp.
>Didn't see the other songs but I was already late getting back to work.
>Anybody know where the other songs are or if they are combat drops?
>Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
>Dol Amroth
>
>
>
>---------------------------------
>Do you Yahoo!?
